医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 推出 Cydem VT 自动克隆筛选系统，加速药物发现https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Accelerates-Drug-Discovery-with-Launch-of-Cydem-VT-Automated-Clone-Screening-System.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Accelerates-Drug-Discovery-with-Launch-of-Cydem-VT-Automated-Clone-Screening-System.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0695198-7080-4f47-b577-f3b8fac71547 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 04:22:00 -0500 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences Accelerates Drug Discovery with Launch of Cydem VT Automated Clone Screening System
肽模拟物作为调节 Aurora-A 和抗癌的新策略一种针对参与细胞分裂的蛋白质的新方法揭示了对其功能的新见解，该蛋白质可能在癌症中功能失调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Peptidomimetics-as-a-new-strategy-to-modulate-Aurora-A-and-combat-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Peptidomimetics-as-a-new-strategy-to-modulate-Aurora-A-and-combat-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5c5a9d2-0c1e-458c-af86-138f6b44d13d Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:51:10 -0500 Peptidomimetics as a new strategy to modulate Aurora-A and combat cancer
酮代谢重新定义衰老大脑中的蛋白质质量控​​制酮体由身体在禁食期间产生以提供燃料，除了能量产生之外，还具有调节细胞过程和衰老机制的作用。巴克研究所的研究表明，酮体最好被理解为影响衰老和阿尔茨海默氏病大脑功能的强大信号代谢物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Ketone-metabolism-redefines- Protein-quality-control-in-aging-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Ketone-metabolism-redefines- Protein-quality-control-in-aging-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9e3418a-b333-4b09-a554-8d581964e75b Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:42:05 -0500 Ketone metabolism redefines protein quality control in aging brains
生物相容性液体墨水使头皮印刷电极能够用于非侵入性脑电图科学家首次发明了一种液体墨水，医生可以将其打印到患者的头皮上以测量大脑活动。该技术于 12 月 2 日发表在 Cell Press 杂志《细胞生物材料》上，为目前用于监测脑电波和诊断神经系统疾病的繁琐过程提供了一种有希望的替代方案。它还具有增强非侵入性脑机接口应用的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Biocompany-liquid-ink-enables-scalp-printed-electrodes-for-non-guarantee-EEG.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Biocompany-liquid-ink-enables-scalp-printed-electrodes-for-non-guarantee-EEG.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d4d217e-4267-4526-a3cc-a2fb2a991fdb Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:34:03 -0500 Biocompatible liquid ink enables scalp-printed electrodes for non-invasive EEG
改善南亚癌症护理的路线图匹兹堡大学领导的国际团队今天在《柳叶刀肿瘤学》上发表了五篇系列论文，强调了南亚区域合作联盟 (SAARC) 和罗兴亚人组成的八个国家与癌症控制相关的重大公共卫生挑战孟加拉国的难民人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/A-roadmap-for-improving-cancer-care-in-South-Asia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/A-roadmap-for-improving-cancer-care-in-South-Asia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea774b6c-e441-41a7-a790-f3bbd85b098c Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:22:47 -0500 A roadmap for improving cancer care in South Asia
怀孕期间抗癫痫药物的新见解斯坦福大学医学院主导的一项研究表明，两种常见的抗癫痫药物拉莫三嗪和左乙拉西坦在怀孕期间可以安全使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-insights-into-anti-seizure-medications-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-insights-into-anti-seizure-medications-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55b7d1c1-068a-4784-ade9-c0dd54d082f8 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:17:51 -0500 New insights into anti-seizure medications during pregnancy
克服开发心脏病细胞疗法的挑战寻找新的心力衰竭治疗方法需要时间；目前接受的两种疗法长达四十年。因此，使用细胞或细胞产品修复梗塞心脏疤痕组织的新尝试需要更多时间来开发可以降低心脏病发作后心力衰竭死亡风险的临床疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Overcoming-challenges-in-developing-cell-therapies-for-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Overcoming-challenges-in-developing-cell-therapies-for-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ccefb50-8fb6-41d7-b8cc-35eabb5dea31 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:12:24 -0500 Overcoming challenges in developing cell therapies for heart disease
Fas-p53 通路驱动代谢功能障碍和肥胖相关的胰岛素抵抗研究人员发现 Fas-p53 轴是脂肪细胞代谢的关键调节因子，通过能量消耗和炎症途径将其与肥胖和胰岛素敏感性联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Fas-p53-pathway-drives-metabolic-dysfunction-and-obesity-linked-insulin-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Fas-p53-pathway-drives-metabolic-dysfunction-and-obesity-linked-insulin-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c268b704-6763-497d-8966-e62c0df35f78 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 00:00:00 -0500 Fas-p53 pathway drives metabolic dysfunction and obesity-linked insulin resistance
绿化城市可以拯救生命并改变城市健康增加意大利的城市绿地每年可以避免 28,433 人死亡，凸显了它们在降低死亡率和改善公共卫生方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Greening-cities-saves-lives-and-transforms-urban-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Greening-cities-saves-lives-and-transforms-urban-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=760d5354-7911-497b-9e5d-678cf6342e9f Mon, 02 Dec 2024 23:33:00 -0500 Greening cities saves lives and transforms urban health
为解决肥胖问题而创造的新型食品级天然解决方案随着肥胖率持续上升，许多人开始转向使用 Ozempic 等处方药来减肥。但由于存在严重的副作用、可及性和成本问题，因此需要替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-food-grade-natural-solution-created-for-tackling-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-food-grade-natural-solution-created-for-tackling-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=487e1a6e-5f4e-49ad-9632-db51584ed735 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 23:25:00 -0500 New food-grade natural solution created for tackling obesity
